items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement a recommendation system that suggests products to users based on their browsing history, purchase history, and similar user behavior.
acceptance_criteria: System generates at least 5 relevant product suggestions for each user session
Recommendations update in real-time as user interacts with the platform
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing
Recommendations are personalized per user account
non_functional: System supports at least 10,000 concurrent users
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: Assumed that the platform already exists or will be developed in parallel; requirement focuses on AI recommendation feature. No details provided on algorithms or data sources, so assumptions made about using browsing and purchase history.
